title: Embroidery fancy scrpt called Sydney
content:
The embroidery companies use a fancy script they call Sydney.  
I wonder if there is a font that matches?  
Thanks.  
Don

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701032021im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SydneyMonogramSM_3482.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [SydneyMonogramSM.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701032021/http:/typophile.com/files/SydneyMonogramSM.jpg) | 92.61 KB |
author: donshottype

comments.content:
Vague similarity to Sweet Upright Script [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sweet/upright-script/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701032021/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sweet/upright-script/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sweet/upright-script/") but it's not very close.  
Don

Another similar but not matching Monogram KK [http://www.dafont.com/monogram-kk.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701032021/http:/www.dafont.com/monogram-kk.font "http://www.dafont.com/monogram-kk.font")  
Don
